dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3672 : To designate the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Indian River, Michigan, as the “Pfc. Justin T. Paton Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Indian River, Michigan, as the Pfc. Justin T. Paton Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

section.header: Designation of Pfc. Justin T. Paton Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic

subsection.text: The community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 5739 Hwy M–68, Indian River, Michigan, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Pfc. Justin T. Paton Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the clinic referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Pfc. Justin T. Paton Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 20, 2023.
